ygData.subject: Re: Pls explain AC
ygData.msgSnippet: What is happening is that the AC of your patchwork outweights the penalty for the weight.  I went through the same thing at low levels. When I switched leather
ygData.messageBody:
What is happening is that the AC of your patchwork outweights the
penalty for the weight. I went through the same thing at low levels.
When I switched leather for mesh armor, which has the same ac but very
low weight, my AC went up over 40 points. You could try swapping cloth
for patchwork. If you swap any given piece and your AC stays the same
or goes up, keep the cloth. Then go get mesh as soon as you can. It
might be hard on the PvP server, though, cause it's found in Guk, right
in the middle of Troll territory.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Steve Hamner [SMTP:shamner@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 10:17 AM
> To: eq-monks@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Pls explain AC
>
> From: "Steve Hamner" <shamner@...>
>
> I am not sure where anyone got the 15 weight is the best for
> monks...can
> someone please explain this...My AC does not change when i drop down
> to or
> below 15, if anything it gets worse as I take my patchwork armor off.
> I
> can't believe this nonsense about the super low weight unless you are
> talking about encumbering weight. I know monks are suppose to use less
> than
> others but I can't go on a huge hunting spree and not carry something
> back
> to sell. Or should I be investing in items instead? Its a little hard
> to
> invest in items on the PVP server since everyone is out to get you
> hehe.
> Suggestions for eq would be most appriciated...where to buy cost?
> Thanks
> Wutanj, asskicking PVP monk
> lvl 8 (almost 9)
>
